  'inventory_status',

  'Style',
  'GTIN',
  'SupplierName',
  'SupplierItemNum',
  'Color',
  'Size',
  'TotalPrice',
  'SKU_STORE_MATCHING'
];

const SOHSQLCol = [
  'product_number',
  'serialNumber',
  'Retail_SOHStoreNumber',
  'Retail_SOHDate',
  'Retail_SOHSKU',
  'Retail_SKU',
  'Retail_SOHQTY',

  'location_id',

  'Subcategory',

  'serial_number',
  'active_sales_price',
  'purchase_price',
  'latest_cost_price',
  'unit',
  'purchase_unit',
  'unit_conversion'
];

const SOHCSVCol = [
'date',
'product_number',
'barcode',
'inventory_status',
'item_ref',
'warehouse',
'location_id',
'quantity',
'average_cost_price',
];


const SOHLOGSQLCol = [
  'product_number',
  'serialNumber',
  'Retail_SOHStoreNumber',
  'Retail_SOHDate',
  'Retail_SOHSKU',
  'Retail_SKU',
  'Retail_SOHQTY',
  'timestamp'
];

const MasterSQLCol = [
  'UniqueID',
  'sku',
  'description',
  'DepartmentID',
  'brand',
  'style',
  'SKU_original',
  'GTINOriginal',
  'GTIN',
  'SupplierName',
  'SupplierItemNum',
  'color',
  'size',
  'season',
  'price',
  'TotalPrice',
  'Product_Code',
  'Consumption',
  'ID',
  'GroupCode',
  'category',
  'POSupplierNum',
  'currency',
  'country',
  'company',
  'SupplierNum',
  'SubdepartmentID',
  'variant',
  'subcategory',
  'artist',
  'author',
  'configuration',
  'release_date',
  'serial_number',
  'active_sales_price',
  'purchase_price',
  'latest_cost_price',
  'unit',
  'purchase_unit',
  'unit_conversion',
  'vat'
];

const MasterCSVCol = [
  'product_number',
  'item_number',
  'variant',
  'item_group',
  'sku',
  'description',
  'barcode',
  'serial_number',
  'size',
  'color',
  'release_date',
  'artist',
  'author',
  'style',
  'configuration',
  'brand',
  'department',
  'subdepartment',
  'supplier',
  'supplier_name',
  'company',
  'class',
  'subclass',
  'vsp',
  'active_sales_price',
  'external_item_number',
  'purchase_price',
  'latest_cost_price',
  'vat',
  'unit',
  'purchase_unit',
  'unit_conversion',
  'Country', //not in CSV
  'Currency', //not in CSV
  ];

flow.set('MasterSQLCol', MasterSQLCol);
flow.set('MasterCSVCol', MasterCSVCol);

flow.set('SOHSQLCol', SOHSQLCol);
flow.set('SOHLOGSQLCol', SOHLOGSQLCol);
flow.set('SOHMASTERFIELDS', SOHMASTERFIELDS);
flow.set('SOHCSVCol', SOHCSVCol);


var flowEnv = {
  SOHSQLCol: flow.get('SOHSQLCol'),
  sqlSOHLog: flow.get('SOHLOGSQLCol')

};

msg.payload = flowEnv;
return msg;

func:
msg.topic="SELECT ASN_HEADER_RECEIPT.RECEIPTKEY, ASN_DETAILS_RECEIPTDETAIL.SKU FROM ASN_HEADER_RECEIPT INNER JOIN ASN_DETAILS_RECEIPTDETAIL ON ASN_HEADER_RECEIPT.RECEIPTKEY=ASN_DETAILS_RECEIPTDETAIL.RECEIPTKEY";
return msg;

msg.topic="Select recommendedLocation From ASN_4232344";
return msg;

msg.topic="insert into ASN_4232344(LPN, )Values('3')";
return msg;

msg.topic="UPDATE ASN_4232344 SET Bin-location = '1000' WHERE LPN='1'";
return msg;

msg.topic="UPDATE ASN_4232344 SET Bin_location = 'shalf12' WHERE LPN='1'";
return msg;

msg.topic="UPDATE ASN_4232344 SET DROP_ID = 'counter1' WHERE LPN='1'";
return msg;

msg.topic="Select PO From ASN_4232344";
return msg;

msg.topic="UPDATE ASN_4232344 SET qty = '2000' WHERE LPN='1'";
return msg;

msg.topic="Select RECEIPTDATE, RECEIPTKEY, SUPPLIERNAME From ASN_HEADER_RECEIPT;";
return msg;

msg.topic="Select * From ASN_DETAILS_RECEIPTDETAIL where RECEIPTKEY = '0000103670';";
return msg;

msg.topic="Select ALTSKU, UOM, QTYEXPECTED, QTYRECEIVED From ASN_DETAILS_RECEIPTDETAIL where SKU = '0000162006'";
return msg;
